entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
